title: The Koala Brothers
resume: The Koala Brothers is an Australian stop-motion animated children's television show that aired on Playhouse Disney that features the adventures of two brothers, Frank and Buster, as they seek to help their neighbors in a sleepy town in the Australian Outback. A notable quality of the series is that although there can be differences of opinion and occasional instances of antisocial or thoughtless behaviour, there are no villains or disagreeable characters. Rather, the emphasis is on helping and being a good friend. The Koala Brothers returned to Disney Junior satellite and cable channel replacing Playhouse Disney on 23 March 2012.
